name: Savior of Dreams (Beta)
description:
The first D.D.R.P.G. - A blend of Adventure/RPG mechanics and rhythm-based gameplay, ideally using a dance pad. Explore the world and fight nightmares to the beat, as you save everyone from the encroaching darkness!

Lia is a travelling bard who finally decides to visit her homeland after receiving a message from her father. When she arrives, the land is covered in a dark mist and the inhabitants have fallen into a deep sleep, consumed by night tremors. With her lyre she’s able to pull them awake, but will she be able to defeat the strongest terror of them all?: The NightMare.


Savior of Dreams' intended controller is a dance pad, like those seen in "Dance Dance Revolution." However, the game is fully playable with just a keyboard.
